roleset.name: give
roleset.note: CONTRIBUTE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'contribute' based on big corpus, comparison with 'give'; adjectival 'contributive' based on BOLT-7. Member of Vncls contribute-13.2-1-1-1. (from contribute.01-v)
CONTRIBUTION-N NOTES: Updated by Julia. Member of Vncls contribute-13.2-1-1-1. (from contribution.01-n)
CONTRIBUTIVE-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from contributive.01-j)
CONTRIBUTORY-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from contributory.01-j)

example.name: contribute-v: unstated thing given
example.text: Pamela Sebastian in New York contributed to this article.

example.name: contribute-v: unstated benefactor
example.text: Last year they contributed #34 million, before taxes.

example.name: contribute-v: topicalized
example.text: Also contributing to the firmness in copper was *trace* a report by Chicago purchasing agents.
example.arg: a report by Chicago purchasing agents.

example.name: contributive-j
example.text: Cancelling the policy by which a home buyer may be granted with a local hukou is an effective and cost - effective means to effectively curb the real estate speculators and effectively bring down the housing prices which still remains high ; in addition , it is also contributive to promoting the development of small towns and more balanced development of various undertakings in the people 's livelihood , especially the development of the countryside .
example.arg: to promoting the development of small towns and more balanced development of various undertakings in the people 's livelihood , especially the development of the countryside

example.name: contribution-n: just arg2
example.text: a contribution to his presidential library

example.name: contribution-n: args 0 & 2
example.text: their contribution to country and society

example.name: contribution-n: with MNR and arg2
example.text: we are also willing to commit to a more active contribution in safeguarding international human rights

example.name: contribution-n: all args
example.text: his contribution of The Apprentice to television

example.name: contribution-n: light Verb!
example.text: In 2010, Ireland made a contribution of ?520000 (US$ 640000**), bringing Ireland's total financial support to the Alliance since 2002 to US$ 27 million.
example.arg: bringing Ireland's total financial support to the Alliance since 2002 to US$ 27 million.
